alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 8:31PM CDT until April 11 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie affecting Richland County. .River continues to rise, with a crest approaching sometime after the 10th of April. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.0 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
